body:
Wow I can hardly believe that I am nearly at a thousand subscribers!
It's a huge milestone, so I want to make a really special video to celebrate this.
Since the Avicus community has been there for me from the start, I want to let you guys decide what video I should make.

Thanks a bunch,
Porky :)
